Name: Knife Quest
About the game: Knife Quest is a platform videogame where the character will have to find 3 coins that will allow him to open a new portal to go to the next level. This is a 2D platform game with his own mechanics, you will always have your knife, your dagger, and you can throw it at the enemies to kill them to clear the way and continue your adventure. In the game there will be a lot of platforms, some more stable, some less and some may even move on their own, so the world of the game will consist of several gameplay phases, even completely unexpected, so, when you play the game... stay focused! In passing the various levels you will also have to pay attention to certain areas of the game that can cause damage to the character. There are secret passages in the game, have fun finding them all!
